document_data.mainbody:
Honest Jack" Bomhoff was a reputable merchant in Sigil that dealt in exotic novelties.
In the month of Hammer, in the , a group of adventurers from Ravens Bluff found themselves transported to the plane of Carceri after defending the githzerai fortress of TahDarr from a tanarri incursion. There they met the fallen paladin Elendil, who knew a good deal about trade in Sigil and was willing to tell the adventurers the names of many reputable merchants, such as "Honest Jack" Bomhoff.
